title: Signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Co-operation in the field of Tourism between Sri Lanka and Estonia
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. John Amaratunga, the Minister of Tourism Development and Christian Religious Affairs, to sign a Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministry of Tourism Development and Christian Religious Affairs of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and the Ministry of Economic Affairs and Communications of the  Republic of Estonia  on co-operation in the field of Tourism, was approved by the Cabinet.
